product.title: Anime Demon Slayer Yoriichi Tsugikuni Sword Building Set | NEW
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Let your inner warrior shine

    Step into the legendary world of Demon Slayer with this Yoriichi Tsugikuni Sword Building Set that you can build! Crafted to honour one of the most revered figures in Demon Slayer lore, this set allows you to recreate the iconic sword wielded by Yoriichi Tsugikuni himself.

    Yoriichi Tsugikuni is a pivotal character in the Demon Slayer series, known for his incredible skill and unwavering determination in the fight against demons. As the original Breath of the Sun user, his sword is a symbol of unparalleled strength and resilience.

    🔥 Measurements: 39 x 5in / 99 x 14cm
    🔥 Not compatible with other blocks
    🔥 Made out of Self-Locking Bricks
    🔥 Plastic Sword and Stand included
    🔥 606+ pieces
    📦 Options to include the original box.

    Don't miss out on the build of a lifetime!

    With this building set, you can bring Yoriichi's legendary sword to life in your own building blocks universe. Immerse yourself in the world of Demon Slayer as you construct and customize your own samurai realm. The sword's design is meticulously crafted to mirror the original anime, ensuring every detail is captured authentically.

    Prepare to embark on epic quests and channel the power of the Breath of the Sun with the Yoriichi Tsugikuni Sword Building Set!
     

     

    Share this experience with your family and friends, or keep it all to yourself!

    These building blocks are a great gift for any Anime and sword fans! This is definitely a memorable gift that comes with easy-to-follow instructions which allow both children and adults to build their very own swords.

    Features

    🔥 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    🔥 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    🔥 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    🔥 High-quality durable non-toxic green material
    🔥 Blue flame effect has been added digitally and is not real

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contains small parts; not suitable for children under 8 years old unless there is adult supervision. Flame effects were added to the images digitally and are not real.


    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet, and reduce postage costs on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide international shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom,  Australia and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • Free Tracked Shipping to the United States, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Netherlands, and many more.

    Small shipping fee to Canada, Italy, Switzerland, Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Ireland, Finland, United Arab Emirates, and a few other countries.

    Packaging time: Est. 1-4 Business days
    Shipping time: Est. 5-15 Business days

    For more details and the latest shipping updates please click here: Shipping Policy.
